org.apache.flex.swf.types

Class MorphFillStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.types.MorphFillStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICharacterReferrer, IDataType, IFillStyle

    public class MorphFillStyle
extends Object
implements IFillStyle
    A fill style represents how a closed shape is filled in.
